rule.demo: assemble the appropriate cleaning tools before cleaning begins
rule.intent: (assemble the appropriate cleaning tools) before (cleaning begins)

rule.demo: notify the user when a cleaning task is completed
rule.intent: (notify the user) when (a cleaning task is completed)

rule.demo: check the cleanliness of the area, clean the area, and then check the cleanliness again
rule.intent: (check the cleanliness of the area), (clean the area), and then (check the cleanliness again)

rule.demo: navigate to the specified room and clean the area in sequence
rule.intent: (navigate to the specified room) and (clean the area) (in sequence)

rule.demo: check if the windows are dirty and clean them if necessary
rule.intent: (check if the windows are dirty) and (clean them) if necessary

rule.demo: navigate to the specified area and grab the required parts while avoiding any dangerous objects
rule.intent: (navigate to the specified area) and (grab the required parts) (while avoiding any dangerous objects)

rule.demo: request for help and navigate to the required area
rule.intent: (request for help) and (navigate to the required area)

rule.demo: check if the cleaning tool is available, and check if there are any areas that require cleaning
rule.intent: (check if the cleaning tool is available), and (check if there are any areas that require cleaning)

rule.demo: confirm that the environment is safe, and then clean the area
rule.intent: (confirm that the environment is safe), and then (clean the area)

rule.demo: before cleaning the area, check if there are any dangerous items in the environment
rule.intent: (before cleaning the area), (check if there are any dangerous items) in the environment

rule.demo: reach the target area, clean it, and then navigate back
rule.intent: (reach the target area), (clean it), and then (navigate back)

rule.demo: navigate to the specified area and pick up the needed tools
rule.intent: (navigate to the specified area) and (pick up the needed tools)

rule.demo: place the clothes in the washing machine, add detergent, and start the wash cycle
rule.intent: (place the clothes in the washing machine), (add detergent), and (start the wash cycle)

rule.demo: request help when necessary and at the same time grab the necessary items
rule.intent: (request help) when necessary and (at the same time grab the necessary items)
rule.pattern: ^(request.*help) when necessary and (at the same time grab.*items)$

rule.demo: check that there is no obstacle in the working area before turning the robot around
rule.intent: (check that there is no obstacle in the working area) before (turning the robot around)

rule.demo: grasp the dirty clothes and put them in the washing machine for cleaning
rule.intent: (grasp the dirty clothes) and (put them in the washing machine for cleaning)

rule.demo: clean the bathroom tiles, toilets, and sinks thoroughly
rule.intent: (clean the bathroom tiles), (toilets), and (sinks) thoroughly

rule.demo: check the dirt level, clean the area, and then check the dirt level again
rule.intent: (check the dirt level), (clean the area), and then (check the dirt level again)

rule.demo: check workpiece size, pick up workpiece, and correctly position the workpiece
rule.intent: (check workpiece size), (pick up workpiece), and (correctly position the workpiece)

rule.demo: clean up the workspace and ensure that the cleaning supplies are complete
rule.intent: (clean up the workspace) and (ensure that the cleaning supplies are complete)

rule.demo: request for help and grab the necessary components simultaneously
rule.intent: (request for help) and (grab the necessary components) (simultaneously)

rule.demo: request help from operator and grab the necessary tools simultaneously
rule.intent: (request help from operator) and (grab the necessary tools) (simultaneously)

rule.demo: check the battery level, and then return to the charging station if it is lower than 20%
rule.intent: (check the battery level), and then (return to the charging station) (if it is lower than 20%)

rule.demo: check for debris on the floor and clean it if necessary
rule.intent: (check for debris on the floor) and (clean it) (if necessary)

rule.demo: use the vacuum cleaner to clean the floor, and stop if there is a safety hazard in the environment
rule.intent: (use the vacuum cleaner) to (clean the floor), and (stop) (if there is a safety hazard in the environment)

rule.demo: retrieve the clothes from the laundry hamper, wash them, and then dry them
rule.intent: (retrieve the clothes from the laundry hamper), (wash them), and then (dry them)

rule.demo: collect garbage, clean dishes, and clean the kitchen
rule.intent: (collect garbage), (clean dishes), and (clean the kitchen)

rule.demo: check the status of the component, and then use the cleaning tool
rule.intent: (check the status of the component), and then (use the cleaning tool)

rule.demo: check that the area is clean and then exit the operation
rule.intent: (check that the area is clean) and then (exit the operation)

rule.demo: check the state of cleanliness and navigate to the unclean area
rule.intent: (check the state of cleanliness) and (navigate to the unclean area)

rule.demo: reuse bt
rule.intent: (reuse bt)

rule.demo: get the necessary cleaning tool, and start cleaning the kitchen from top to bottom
rule.intent: (get the necessary cleaning tool), and (start cleaning the kitchen) (from top to bottom)

rule.demo: navigate to the desired location, and clean up any surrounding mess
rule.intent: (navigate to the desired location), and (clean up any surrounding mess)

rule.demo: stop cleaning when encountering dangerous items.
rule.intent: (stop cleaning) when (encountering dangerous items)

rule.demo: check if the bathroom is occupied, and then clean it once it is available
rule.intent: (check if the bathroom is occupied), and then (clean it) once (it is available)

rule.demo: request help from a human operator when needed
rule.intent: (request help) from (a human operator) (when needed)
